text: (calm music)
- Hi, I'm Charles Roberts.

I'm a senior security
consultant with AWS Proserve.
(intriguing music)
Security is really about helping customers
become comfortable using the cloud.
When I left the army, I didn't write code,

I managed to teams of people
and I was just really lucky
to oversee the amazing work that they did.

But I was always interested
in how stuff worked.
I did a computer science degree
but I haven't touched code in a long time.

What AWS has done for me is
to go further on that journey
which is I'm now actually doing the doing
so I'll get to write the code.
And one of the things I love about AWS

is you send some commands
over the internet
and magic just happens.
In the course of my time with AWS,
I've gone from not knowing any Python
to actually writing a Python workshop
which is out there for people to use.
You only get one life, right?
(intriguing music)
